name: Daniel Louise
text: Hello Stevie, I was wondering if we could change the header please

name: Daniel Louise
text: I would like it to say "Hello world! instead, please? Oh, speaking of world could we also change the body image to a globe if possible, how much time would that take maybe?

name: Stevie Feliciano
text: Absolutely that should be no problem at all, the change should show as quick as I update the image for you. Did you know you can edit the header yourself in our new version of Otomo? Here is the link: http://otomo.io/bannerID
